archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Develop Product Offering Price Action
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
Brief Description Develop a product offering price action that represents the outcome of the successful evaluation of one or more policy conditions. Extended Description Develop Product Offering Price Action develops (creates, updates, and removes) a product offering price action that represents the outcome of the successful evaluation of one or more policy conditions.
An action is part of a policy rule that is made up of a conditions and actions. Conditions and actions are defined by policy statements. For example a statement for an action may be "get two software packages from a choice of five for free".
